name: Cavity Busters
description:
Take control of Gummy The Soft, whose fall from The Great Gob was far and hard. Chomp your way through tough as teeth enemies and the dreaded Pearly Knights, a true test of your enam-mettle. Collect upgrades AND diseases to enhance your agility and control over your one and only tooth. Brush and floss daily.Features
  • Hundreds of upgrades and diseases
  • Boss fights with multiple phases
  • Hundreds of handcrafted rooms
  • Tons of enemies
  • Challenging rewarding combat
  • Slow motion
  • Accessibility options
  • So much bodily fluid
  • More teeth puns then you can shake a tooth brush at
  • More fun then going to the dentist
  • BOSS FIGHTS
The Pearly Knights wont go down without a fight. Face bosses that will fight tooth and tooth to guard their... little rectangle room... But they love it and it's theirs so beware!
  • DISEASES
Contract diseases as you play. Diseases are powerful but come at a price. Do you risk the poison of diarrhea for the speed and urgency it creates in you? There's a legend of a creature that can administer a cure. Can you find him?
  • COMBAT
Combat is deep and rewarding. Use the agility and stickiness of your little gummy to run on walls. Jump high above the mess of it all to get a better view or to dodge an impossible amount of bullets. While your in the air why not take the time to reflect on your life. The purchase you made....WAIT! That enemy is stunned! JUMP ON IT!!! As a kid, did you ever try to re-insert your baby tooth back into its gummy cavity? No? Well now's you chance! Shoot your tooth and suck back!
  • OPTIONS
Do you hate rogue-lites? There's options to make the game more forgiving! Want to start the game with a bunch of health? Want to have endless continues? Or there's more subtle options that no one will notice if you use. This wont block off content though. You play how you want.
